  • Method Details

    • doAction

      public static void doAction​(JFrame frame, String[] userGitInfo, String[] userTrelloInfo, int flag) throws IOException
      Function that does everything. Connects the UI's to the api's.
      Parameters:
      frame - The frame to attach the info.
      userGitInfo - String array with[git_owner, git_repo, git_token]
      userTrelloInfo - String array with [trello_name, trello_key, trello_token]
      flag - flag == 1 if it is needed to scale the window size, any number otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • saveData

      public static void saveData​(String[] userGitInfo, String[] userTrelloInfo)
      Function that calls another function in order to save the user data in a .txt file
      Parameters:
      userGitInfo - info needed for git api.
      userTrelloInfo - info needed for trello api.

    • convertMarkdownToHTML

      public static String convertMarkdownToHTML​(String markdown)
      Function that converts a give string (in markdown) to the same string formatted in html.
      Parameters:
      markdown - the string in markdown
      Returns:
      the string 'markdown' converted for html

    • clearFrame

      public static void clearFrame​(JFrame frame)
      Function that clear every thing that is on the frame at the moment
      Parameters:
      frame - the JFrame that the project is based on

    • homeScreen

      public static void homeScreen​(JFrame frame, pt.iscte.iul.GitHubAPI gitHubAPI, pt.iscte.iul.TrelloAPI trelloAPI, String boardID) throws IOException
      Function that shows the default information on the screen.
      Parameters:
      frame - the frame to show the info.
      gitHubAPI - the github api instance.
      trelloAPI - the trello api instance.
      Throws:
      IOException
